title: My game wont load after champion pick.
body: Seen I am in another region i  couldn't create a discussion using my other account so i'll be suing my NA region account. This weekend i wanted to play league, i could log in everything was okay, when i finished picking my champ my game didnt want to load, then suddendly a msg about maestro pop up and it closed my game, i tried again the same step, picking a champ on a custom game and still the same error, but this time a reconnect button pop up and when i clicked on it the game automatically closed itself. i tried finding fix for this and it says firewall. i followed the same step as the guide told me on troubleshooting firewall, i turn it off and still the same error it didnt fix for me, i even reinstalled the game and still the same error. please help...

replies.body: Sorry to hear these issues are happening on your weekend.  :/  I know you've tried some steps already, and I suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure that your firewall is being configured properly since it does it automatically.  Make sure that you also go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, not just one or a few, as it will help rule out more possibilities.  Let me know how this all goes for you!
On the hextech repair tool do I check on "Add Firewall Exceptions" or "Disable Firewall" ?

> On the hextech repair tool do I check on "Add Firewall Exceptions" or "Disable Firewall" ?

I'd recommend adding an exception.  I'm not trying to tell players to disable their securities.  :P  The steps the guide suggests are your best bet.

By any chance is there somehow I can communicate with you though discord or skype? so it can be much easier and i can finish with this struggle of 8 hours trying to fix my issue, i am not even kidding... i've been contacting riot support but somehow i still cant get my game fixed but sadly they keep sending me same guides and messages...

Sorry for the hassle you've been going through, but the only venue we offer right now is a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We're happy to help you through a ticket if you haven't already submitted one, and work with you individually.  If you take this route, use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to your ticket for context.  Hang in there!
